original_text: When Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king, she went into the house of the Lord to the people.
korean_text: 아달랴가 백성들이 뛰며 왕을 찬송하는 소리를 듣고 여호와의 전에 들어가서 백성에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: When Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king
sentences.korean_translation: 아달랴가 백성들이 달려가며 왕을 찬양하는 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: she went into the house of the Lord to the people.
